sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import '../styles/home.css' import { Container, Row, Col } from 'reactstrap'; import heroImg from '../assets/images/hero-img01.jpg' import heroImg02 from '../assets/images/hero-img02.jpg' import heroVideo from '../assets/images/hero-video.mp4' import worldImg from '../assets/images/world.png' import experienceImg from '../assets/images/experience.png' import Subtitle from "../shared/subtitle"; import SearchBar from "../shared/SearchBar"; import FeaturedTourList from "../components/Featured-tours/FeaturedTourList"; import ServiceList from "../services/ServiceList"; import MasonryImagesGallery from "../components/image-gallery/MasonryImagesGallery"; import Testimonials from "../components/Testimonial/Testimonials"; import Newsletter from "../shared/Newsletter"; const Home = () => { return <>
{/* hero section start */}

Traveling opens the door to creating memories

Traveling is a great way to expand your horizons and learn more about the world. Going to new places and experiencing new things is an invaluable experience that will stay with you for the rest of your life.
{/* hero section end */}
What We Serve

We offer our best Services
{/* featured tour section start */}

Our Featured tours
{/* featured tour section end */} {/* experience section start */}

With our all experience
we will serve you

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet consectetur adipisicing elit.
Accusantium corrupti odit, exercitationem, repellendus ullam modi sint,

12k+
Successfull Trip
2k+
Regular Clients
12k+
Years experience
{/* experience section end */} {/* gallery section starts here */}

Visit Our Customer Tour Gallery
{/* gallery section ends here */} {/* TESTIMONIAL SECTION STARTS */}

What our fans say about us
{/* TESTIMONIAL SECTION ENDS */} }; export default Home;
